sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { delUser } from '../../store/actions' import Button from '../UI/Button/Button' import Modal from "../UI/Modal/Modal" import './UserItem.css' export default function UserItem({ id, name, email, changeStateOfModal }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) return ( <> {modal ? : <> } < li className = "list-item" >

{name}

{email}
) }
